actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to express the sense of Congress that legislation be enacted to control and reverse inflationary trends and that an effective agency be created to administer such controls.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that legislation be enacted to control and reverse inflationary trends and that an effective agency be created to administer such controls.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to express the sense of Congress that legislation be enacted to control and reverse inflationary trends and that an effective agency be created to administer such controls.
